name: taskstudy-fullstack
description: TaskStudy - Academic Task Management System (Full Stack)

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run setup:env
scripts.clean: cd backend && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul & cd ../frontend && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul & rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd backend && npm run format && cd ../frontend && npm run format
